snippet: Pete Weber tied Earl Anthony by winning his 10th major Professional Bowlers Association title with a 224-179 win over Jason Belmonte in the Tournament of Champions in Indianapolis.
abstract: Pete Weber ties Earl Anthony by winning his 10th major Professional Bowlers Association title with 224-179 win over Jason Belmonte in Tournament of Champions in Indianapolis.
lead_paragraph: Pete Weber tied Earl Anthony by winning his 10th major Professional Bowlers Association title with a 224-179 win over Jason Belmonte in the Tournament of Champions in Indianapolis.

headline.seo: Pete Weber Takes 10th Major Professional Bowlers Association title
